title: Kerygma & Martyria: Puisi-Puisi Remy Sylado
description:
Kerygma.
 The word, as substantive, denotes both the act and the message, and ranges in meaning from 'address' and 'call out' to 'summons' - Encyclopedia of Theology  Karl Rahner
Martyria.
 Evidence given judicially or genitive record, repot, testimony, witness. - Dictionary of the Greek Testament Exhaustive Concordance James Strong
author: Remy Sylado
